video:video.video:title: Mortgage points
video:video.video:description: You have an option to reduce the interest rate on your mortgage loan by “paying for points.” One point costs 1% of your mortgage amount and can reduce your interest rate by about .25, meaning a lower monthly payment over the life of the loan.
